Action.author: krw910
Action.body: ~moidinis is appears that there is a space in the dest ID of the 4th node ('4P S3E) If this is the cause then this is a validation issue.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: Upgrade 0.4.36 -> 0.4.37 works correctly (version parameter is the indy-node version, not sovrin like it was discussed earlier). Upgrade to current or nonexistent version now has no effect.
